resources.string:
This application is not a system signature and does not occupy system reserved space.

 Step 1: Fill Internal Storage

 Step 2: Fill Local Data Storage

 Step 4: Check if the Free size is 0B (Inside the brackets is the system reserved space)

 Step 5: Fill the Local Data Storage again until the Free size is 0B

 Step 6: Reboot the Phone (The system will remove some cache as much as possible to free up space.)

 Step 7: repeat step 4. if the Free Size still 0 , these test got passed.
